name: StuntCopter
description:
Haven't you always wanted to fly in a helicopter? Then jump out without a parachute? And hope you land in a hay wagon? Then you're going to love this game.

Pilot a helicopter by tilting your device and tap to send the stunt man flying. If he lands on the hay wagon, then you get points and you get to keep going!

It's simple and addictive (like you'd expect from a stunt man and a copter).

Thanks to Duane Blehm for the great game on classic Macintosh.
